abstract: The euro and European stock markets have plummeted this year, but the Continent isn’t suffering alone. The ease and speed with which merchandise, money and ugly news travel across borders have ensured that American investors are sharing the pain.
snippet: The euro and European stock markets have plummeted this year, but the Continent isn’t suffering alone. The ease and speed with which merchandise, money and ugly news travel across borders have ensured that American investors are sharing the pain.
lead_paragraph: The euro and European stock markets have plummeted this year, but the Continent isn’t suffering alone. The ease and speed with which merchandise, money and ugly news travel across borders have ensured that American investors are sharing the pain, The New York Times’s Conrad de Aenlle reported.

headline.main: Some Aren’t Crying Over a Weak Euro

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
